name: PRO_CMT_PRODUCTION_CLOSE
body_snippet:
procedure pro_cmt_production_close(parm_locator_id          number,
                                 parm_knit_Date           date,
                                 parm_shift_id            number,
                                 parm_SHIFT               varchar,
                                 parm_OPERATION_ID        number,
                                 parm_SALES_ORDER_ID      number,
                                 parm_operation_struct_id number,
                                 parm_operation_seg02_id  number,
                                 parm_BAL_DZN             number,
                                 parm_BAL_PCS             number,
                                 parm_OPN_DZN             number,
                                 parm_OPN_PCS             number,
                                 parm_PROD_DZN            number,
                                 parm_PROD_PCS            number,
                                 parm_DCLRD_WASTE_DZN     number,
                                 parm_DCLRD_WASTE_PCS     number,
                                 parm_RE_WORK_DZN         number,
                                 parm_RE_WORK_PCS         number,
                                 parm_INVISIBLE_WASTE_DZN number,
                                 parm_INVISIBLE_WASTE_PCS number,
                                 parm_INVISIBLE_GAIN_DZN  number,
                                 parm_INVISIBLE_GAIN_PCS  number,
                                 parm_batch_id
